text: Paul Caddick (born July 1950) is a British businessman, founder of Caddick Group, a civil engineering business, and Moda Living, a property development company, and is the director of 119 companies. ==Early life== Paul Caddick is the son of a miner. ==Career== Cadddick worked for West Yorkshire County Council, John Laing and the civil engineers Sir Lindsay Parkinson, before starting his own business in 1980. In 1997, he and Gary Hetherington purchased Leeds Rhinos rugby team, and they co-founded Leeds Rugby Limited. ==See also== *List of Super League rugby league club owners *List of owners of English football clubs *List of professional sports team owners ==References== ==External links== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:British businesspeople Category:Rugby league chairmen and investors Category:Leeds Rhinos
title: Paul Caddick
